course_title: Psychotherapeutic Interventions Across the Lifespan III
course_description: Emphasis is on in-depth analysis of research and theory as a basis for clinical practice, exploration of the mental health recovery paradigm, and planning and intervention in the complex care of individuals across the lifespan with comorbid diagnoses and medical conditions.
prerequisites: NRSG 839D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2359, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: K. Pfeiffer, Status: Open
